questions.question: You are telling me that any of these people can do anything close to the work you do?
Because I think something has to be falsifiable if we're gonna make a claim, right?
When I open Twitter, everyone seems to say- Why do you only follow one person?
So I love, obviously, it sounds like I'm a robot saying, I love humor, okay?
But then I actually listened to Alex and I was thinking, is this human being dangerous for the world?
I've only heard Donald Trump do it the last year, but the last three years, you're saying somebody else?
But like, don't you think like fake it until you make it is the right way to do it?
Even here, why are we building hospitals in Iraq that we destroyed when we could building hospitals here?
So first of all, speaking broadly about Libertarianism, can you speak to that, how you feel about it?
So as a troll on Twitter, in the best sense of the word, what do you make of cancel culture?
He's one of the key people in the history of computer science, one of those open source people, right?
I don't think you're like, you didn't grow up wanting to be a podcaster, right?
So when I set out to write it, I'm like, okay, what can I do?
